attributes.action: Turn entry hill golf course into a mountain bike park(bath, north eats Somerset)
attributes.additional_details: This addition to bath would be very popular amongst the young, and would likely improve livelihoods. I’m in my last year of GCSE’s, and building/riding at park just down the road would mean the world to m! I’m sure the park would get a lot of positive feedback, both from riders and builders alike.
attributes.background: Entry hill golf course, in the recent years has lost value and publicity and is significantly less popular than it used to be. There’s been talk of turning it into a mountain bike park, since it’s on the perfect hill, but it’s all talk. I, for one, would be happy to volunteer, as would others!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the landowner.
